Let E be a finite-dimensional real normed space and U âŠ† E a convex set. Let f : E â†’ â„ be C^2 on U (ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U). Then there exists a formal Taylor series p (HasFTaylorSeriesUpToOn 2 f p U), and the second-order Taylor expansion is uniform on compact subsets of U: for every compact K âŠ† U and every Îµ > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that for all x âˆˆ K and all h with x + h âˆˆ U and â€–hâ€– < Î´ one has
| f (x + h) - (f x + p x 1 h + (1/2) * (p x 2) (h, h)) | â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€–^2.

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]

/-- Let U be convex and f be C^2 on U. Then there exists a formal Taylor series p (HasFTaylorSeriesUpToOn 2 f p U),
and the second-order Taylor expansion is uniform on compact subsets of U: for every compact K âŠ† U and every Îµ > 0
there exists Î´ > 0 such that for all x âˆˆ K and all h with x + h âˆˆ U and â€–hâ€– < Î´ one has
  | f (x + h) - (f x + (p x 1) h + (1/2) * (p x 2) (h, h)) | â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€–^2. -/
theorem taylor_second_order_uniform_on_compact
  {U : Set E} (hU_convex : Convex â„ U) (f : E â†’ â„) (hfn : ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U) :
  âˆƒ p : E â†’ FormalMultilinearSeries â„ E â„, HasFTaylorSeriesUpToOn 2 f p U âˆ§
    (âˆ€ K : Set E, IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
      âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, âˆ€ h : E, x + h âˆˆ U â†’ â€–hâ€– < Î´ â†’
        |f (x + h) - (f x + (p x 1) h + (1 / 2) * (p x 2) (h, h))| â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€– ^ 2) :=
by sorry

import Mathlib

open Set

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]

/-- Let U be convex and f be C^2 on U. Then there exists a formal Taylor series p (HasFTaylorSeriesUpToOn 2 f p U),
and the second-order Taylor expansion is uniform on compact subsets of U: for every compact K âŠ† U and every Îµ > 0
there exists Î´ > 0 such that for all x âˆˆ K and all h with x + h âˆˆ U and â€–hâ€– < Î´ one has
  | f (x + h) - (f x + (p x 1) h + (1/2) * (p x 2) (h, h)) | â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€–^2. -/
theorem taylor_second_order_uniform_on_compact
  {U : Set E} (hU_convex : Convex â„ U) (f : E â†’ â„) (hfn : ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U) :
  âˆƒ p : E â†’ FormalMultilinearSeries â„ E â„, HasFTaylorSeriesUpToOn 2 f p U âˆ§
    (âˆ€ K : Set E, IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
      âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, âˆ€ h : E, x + h âˆˆ U â†’ â€–hâ€– < Î´ â†’
        |f (x + h) - (f x + (p x 1) (fun _ => h) + (1 / 2) * (p x 2) (fun _ => h))| â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€– ^ 2) :=
by sorry
